#include <cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
 
ll powN(ll num,int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
		return 1;
	else if(n == 1)
		return num;
	ll temp = powN(num,n/2);
	if(n&1)
		return num*temp*temp;
	else
		return temp*temp;
}
 
ll ans(int n)
{
	if(n == 0 || n == 1)
		return n;
	else
		return powN(2*n - 1, 2) + (n-1);
}
 
int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	ll t, n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",ans(n));
	}
	return 0;
}
